name: ALIVE BUT DEAD! BETA
description:
You are locked up in a prison and most of the world population has converted into Blood Drinking creatures.

Amazing Adventures are waiting for you.

Experience the world of fear.

Zombies are Lurking around.

Zombie Apocalypse has started.

Survive! Escape!

Play Offline for free.

Keep your defense up.

You are the last hope.

Complete your Mission and Save the World.

Survive to the end of the zombie war and build a new world! 

Download & fight against the zombie apocalypse.
